So I'm very, very excited about that. So this has a pretty similar design to the previous version but it has the brand new H2 chip. It has high band connectivity, new low distortion driver with custom amplifier. It also has personalized spatial audio, so you'll be able to use iOS 16 to scan your ear. You may have seen me talk before about Sony's headphones, because they have the similar thing where you can actually scan your ear to get customized audio. Well now the AirPods actually have that too. So you're gonna be able to scan your ear and be able to get customized spatial audio, depending upon the shape of your ear, which is pretty awesome, because as we know, we all have different shaped ears, and sometimes a lot of AirPods don't work for my ears. So I'm very excited to try this out to get customized audio. We also now have smaller ear tips, which is also very exciting because I do have trouble sometimes with these in my ears.
